org.fcrepo.metrics

Class MetricsConfig.GraphiteConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.metrics.MetricsConfig.GraphiteConfig
  • Enclosing class:
    MetricsConfig

    @Configuration
public static class MetricsConfig.GraphiteConfig
extends Object

    Metrics configuration for Graphite reporting.

    Graphite reporting can be enabled by activating the "metrics.graphite" Spring profile.

      com.codahale.metrics.graphite.Graphite graphiteClient()
      Host and port may be configured with system properties "fcrepo.metrics.host" and "fcrepo.metrics.port", respectively.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetricsConfig.GraphiteConfig

        public MetricsConfig.GraphiteConfig()

    • Method Detail

      • graphiteClient

        @Bean
public com.codahale.metrics.graphite.Graphite graphiteClient()

        Host and port may be configured with system properties "fcrepo.metrics.host" and "fcrepo.metrics.port", respectively.

        Host and port default to "localhost" and "2003", respectively.

        Returns:
        a Graphite client to a Carbon server

      • graphiteReporter

        @Bean
public com.codahale.metrics.graphite.GraphiteReporter graphiteReporter()
        Returns:
        a Reporter which publishes metrics to a Graphite server
